Description:
POSITION SUMMARYThe position requires me to work across multi-disciplinary teams as well as different cultures around the world. We are looking for a candidate with good communication skills in both verbal and written English and all-round flexibility to commit time and effort to achieve project requirements.The successful candidate will be required to work independently and serve in a lead position, in which he/she reports to the Project Manager and can be asked to get involved in technical discussions with the Client representatives.EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCEThe Process Engineer shall hold a B. Sc. Engineering Degree.
Must have thorough knowledge of engineering practices and economic principles, calculation methods. design details, international codes and standards, procedures, and specifications.
Have knowledge in the use of industry wide design software packages.
Bring experience to suggest new economical ways in designing the work – identify problem areas in the work practices and suggest improvements based on feedback and own previous experience.
The Project scope is applicable for the following Process Units and Utilities. Experience in (some of) these technologies is a pre-requisite.
A01 - Gasification Unit.
A02 - Hydrogen Recovery Unit
A03 – Sulfur Removal Unit
A05 - Air Separation Unit
A06 – Soot & Ash Recovery
A07 – Sulfur Recovery Unit
A10 - Power Blocks (Gas Turbines, Heat Recovery Steam Generators, Steam Turbines)Job Details
